mapper.select:
SELECT /* com.at.apcss.fm.bbs.mapper.BbsMngMapper.selectBbsList */ CM.BBS_NO AS BBS_NO , CM.BBS_TTL AS BBS_TTL , CM.BBS_SE_CD AS BBS_SE_CD , (SELECT FN_GET_COM_CD_VL_NM('BBS_SE_CD', CM.BBS_SE_CD) FROM DUAL) AS BBS_SE_CD_NM , CM.BBS_SBJT AS BBS_SBJT
, DECODE(CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_ID , #{userId} , '1' , '') AS BBS_EIDT_CHK
, ANS_STTS , (SELECT FN_GET_COM_CD_VL_NM('ANS_STTS', CM.ANS_STTS) FROM DUAL) AS ANS_STTS_NM , ANS_SBJT , ANS_USER_ID , (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_ID = CM.ANS_USER_ID) AS ANS_USER_NM , TO_CHAR(CM.ANS_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ANS_DT
, PRVT_PST_YN
, CM.DEL_YN AS DEL_YN
, CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_DT AS SYS_FRST_INPT_DT , TO_CHAR(CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SYS_FRST_INPT_DT_YMD , CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_ID AS SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_ID , (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_ID = CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_ID) AS SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_ID_NM , CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_PRGRM_ID AS SYS_FRST_INPT_PRGRM_ID , CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_DT AS SYS_LAST_CHG_DT , TO_CHAR(CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SYS_LAST_CHG_DT_YMD , CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_ID AS SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_ID , (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_ID = CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_ID) AS SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_ID_NM , CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_PRGRM_ID AS SYS_LAST_CHG_PRGRM_ID , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_APC_ATTACH WHERE ATCHFL_PRNTSNO = CM.BBS_NO) AS ATT_CNT
FROM TB_BBS CM WHERE 1=1 AND CM.DEL_YN = 'N' AND CM.BBS_NO = #{bbsNo} AND 1 = (CASE WHEN CM.PRVT_PST_YN = 'Y' AND #{userType} in ('00','01','02') THEN 1 WHEN CM.PRVT_PST_YN = 'Y' AND #{userId} = CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_ID THEN 1 WHEN CM.PRVT_PST_YN = 'N' OR CM.PRVT_PST_YN IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 2 END)

SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW_SEQ , COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTAL_RECORD_COUNT , pt0.* FROM (
SELECT /* com.at.apcss.fm.bbs.mapper.BbsMngMapper.selectBbsList */ CM.BBS_NO AS BBS_NO , CM.BBS_SE_CD AS BBS_SE_CD , (SELECT FN_GET_COM_CD_VL_NM('BBS_SE_CD', CM.BBS_SE_CD) FROM DUAL) AS BBS_SE_CD_NM
, (CASE WHEN CM.PRVT_PST_YN = 'Y' AND #{userType} in ('00','01','02') THEN CM.BBS_TTL WHEN CM.PRVT_PST_YN = 'Y' AND #{userId} = CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_ID THEN CM.BBS_TTL WHEN CM.PRVT_PST_YN = 'N' OR CM.PRVT_PST_YN IS NULL THEN CM.BBS_TTL ELSE '비밀글입니다' END ) AS BBS_TTL
, ANS_STTS , TO_CHAR(CM.ANS_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ANS_DT
, PRVT_PST_YN
, DECODE(CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_ID , #{userId} , '1' , '') AS BBS_EIDT_CHK
, CM.DEL_YN AS DEL_YN
, CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_DT AS SYS_FRST_INPT_DT , TO_CHAR(CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SYS_FRST_INPT_DT_YMD , CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_ID AS SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_ID , (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_ID = CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_ID) AS SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_ID_NM , CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_PRGRM_ID AS SYS_FRST_INPT_PRGRM_ID , CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_DT AS SYS_LAST_CHG_DT , TO_CHAR(CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SYS_LAST_CHG_DT_YMD , CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_ID AS SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_ID , (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_ID = CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_ID) AS SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_ID_NM , CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_PRGRM_ID AS SYS_LAST_CHG_PRGRM_ID , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_APC_ATTACH WHERE ATCHFL_PRNTSNO = CM.BBS_NO) AS ATT_CNT FROM TB_BBS CM WHERE 1=1 AND CM.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND CM.BBS_NO = #{bbsNo}
AND CM.BBS_TTL LIKE '%' || #{bbsTtl} || '%'
AND ( CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_ID IN (SELECT USER_ID FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE 1=1 AND USER_NM LIKE '%' || #{bbsUserNm} || '%') OR
CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_ID IN (SELECT USER_ID FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE 1=1 AND USER_NM LIKE '%' || #{bbsUserNm} || '%') )
AND CM.BBS_SE_CD = #{bbsSeCd}
AND CM.DEL_YN = #{delYn}
ORDER BY CM.BBS_NO DESC
) pt0 OFFSET (#{currentPageNo} - 1) * #{recordCountPerPage} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{recordCountPerPage} ROWS ONLY
